text.div:
Generated Narrative: PlanDefinition HIV-A-Registration-PlanDefinition

url: PlanDefinition PlanDefinition - HIV.A. Registration

version: 0.3.0

name: PlanDefinition_HIV.A. Registration

title: PlanDefinition - HIV.A. Registration

type: Workflow Definition

status: Active

experimental: true

date: 2024-11-07 21:07:17+0000

publisher: WHO

contact: WHO: http://who.int

description:

To ensure client is found in the record system and personal details are updated or, if not located, entered into the system to be put into a queue awaiting counselling.

action

title: Registration business process

description: To ensure client is found in the record system and personal details are updated or, if not located, entered into the system to be put into a queue awaiting counselling

participant

type: Patient

role: client

participant

type: Practitioner

role: TrainedLayProvider

action

id

HIV.A.1

title: Arrive at facility

description: Client arrives at the health facility.

RelatedActions

-ActionIdRelationship
*HIV.A.2Before Start

Participants

-TypeRole
*Patientclient

action

id

HIV.A.2

title: Gather client’s details

description: Ask the client whether he or she has previously been issued a unique identifier

RelatedActions

-ActionIdRelationship
*HIV.A.3Before Start

Participants

-TypeRole
*Patientclient

action

id

HIV.A.3

title: Search for client record

description: This search process can be done through a variety of means depending on what mechanisms are available in the record system. For example, clients can be searched for by name, unique identifier, or QR code.

RelatedActions

-ActionIdRelationship
*HIV.A.4Before Start

Participants

-TypeRole
*PractitionerTrainedLayProvider

action

id

HIV.A.4

title: Match found?

description: If multiple records are found and no unique ID, use option to merge records

RelatedActions

-ActionIdRelationship
*HIV.A.7Before Start

Participants

-TypeRole
*PractitionerTrainedLayProvider

groupingBehavior: Logical Group

selectionBehavior: Exactly One

action

id

HIV.A.5

title: Create new client record

description: If a previous unique identifier has been issued, use the same number to create the client record.

RelatedActions

-ActionIdRelationship
*HIV.A.4Before End

Participants

-TypeRole
*PractitionerTrainedLayProvider

action

id

HIV.A.6

title: Validate client details

description: Review and update client record or ask for information and complete new client record:

RelatedActions

-ActionIdRelationship
*HIV.A.4Before End

action

id

HIV.A.6.1

title: Review sociodemographic data with client

description: Review client’s non-clinical information, such as name, address, contact information, etc.

RelatedActions

-ActionIdRelationship
*HIV.A.6.2Before Start

Participants

-TypeRole
*PractitionerTrainedLayProvider

action

id

HIV.A.6.2

title: Update needed?

description: Has the client moved? Has the client changed contact information? Has any other sociodemographic information changed?

RelatedActions

-ActionIdRelationship
*HIV.A.6.3Before Start

Participants

-TypeRole
*PractitionerTrainedLayProvider

action

id

HIV.A.6.3

title: Update client details

description: Ask client to provide updated information if address or other details have changed since last contact

RelatedActions

-ActionIdRelationship
*HIV.A.7Before Start

Participants

-TypeRole
*PractitionerTrainedLayProvider

action

id

HIV.A.7

title: Check in client

description: Add client to the relevant queue for services

name: PlanDefinition_HIV.A. Registration
title: PlanDefinition - HIV.A. Registration
description: To ensure client is found in the record system and personal details are updated or, if not located, entered into the system to be put into a queue awaiting counselling.

action.title: Registration business process
action.description: To ensure client is found in the record system and personal details are updated or, if not located, entered into the system to be put into a queue awaiting counselling

action.title: Arrive at facility
action.description: Client arrives at the health facility.

action.title: Gather client’s details
action.description: Ask the client whether he or she has previously been issued a unique identifier

action.title: Search for client record
action.description: This search process can be done through a variety of means depending on what mechanisms are available in the record system. For example, clients can be searched for by name, unique identifier, or QR code.

action.title: Match found?
action.description: If multiple records are found and no unique ID, use option to merge records

action.title: Create new client record
action.description: If a previous unique identifier has been issued, use the same number to create the client record.

action.title: Validate client details
action.description: Review and update client record or ask for information and complete new client record:

action.title: Review sociodemographic data with client
action.description: Review client’s non-clinical information, such as name, address, contact information, etc.

action.title: Update needed?
action.description: Has the client moved? Has the client changed contact information? Has any other sociodemographic information changed?

action.title: Update client details
action.description: Ask client to provide updated information if address or other details have changed since last contact

action.title: Check in client
action.description: Add client to the relevant queue for services
